General.Name: Majuperak Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Majuperak Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the property development and management business primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development; Facilities Management; Renewable Energy; and Trading, Rental, Investment Holding, and Others Segments. It invests in and develops residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural properties. The company also offers contract management services; and owns and operates a solar power farm that generates 1,900 megawatts electricity located in Keramat Pulai and Simpang Pulai, Perak. In addition, it is involved in the merchandise sourcing and supply business; and provision of contract, secretarial, and management services. The company was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Ipoh, Malaysia. Majuperak Holdings Berhad is a subsidiary of Perbadanan Kemajuan Negeri Perak.
